hero.subtitle: Web Developer
hero.description: I'm a passionate web developer focused on creating modern and responsive user interfaces with React and Next.js.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a web developer with experience in building responsive and high-performance web applications. I specialize in JavaScript, React, and Next.js for frontend development.
Currently focused on creating intuitive user interfaces and improving web accessibility across different platforms.

My professional journey has involved working with diverse technologies including React, Angular, Node.js, and various cloud platforms. I pride myself on being adaptable and staying current with the latest technological trends and best practices.
about.education: Computer Engineering - Universidad Nacional de Colombia

items.title: Platform for Centene Corp
items.description: Complete redesign of a medical platform. Led the migration to Angular 17, implemented complex forms with validation, and developed scripts for MongoDB data management.

items.title: Management System for Xybion
items.description: Developed a platform for migrating data from XML to JSON, implementing microservices with NestJS and frontend development in Angular with a TDD approach.

items.title: News Platform for McClatchy USA
items.description: Led frontend development with Vue.js and JavaScript, implemented unit tests with Jest, and configured continuous deployment with Jenkins.

items.title: International Payments Platform
items.description: Development of modules for an international payment platform using Angular with Server-Side Rendering to improve performance and SEO.

items.title: Logistics System for DAT USA
items.description: Led the frontend team to develop a logistics system, establishing the architecture and designing a reusable component library.

items.title: Banking Portal for Banbajio MX
items.description: Developed frontend modules for the banking portal using Angular with a focus on microservices architecture and reactive flows with RxJS.
